original_title: VeggieTales: LarryBoy and the Bad Apple
overview: Someone called the Bad Apple seeks to rule Bumblyburg by making Mayor Blueberry, Petunia Rhubarb, and LarryBoy (as well as Alfred) victims of various temptations.  Soon everyone who has become trapped by their temptations realizes that they need the help of others around them in order to fight back and defeat the Bad Apple.
title: VeggieTales: LarryBoy and the Bad Apple
